heading.tnt-trx-ref-value: GOD LOVES YOU AND CREATED YOU TO KNOW HIM PERSONALLY.

title.heading: INIIBIG KA NG DIYOS AT NILIKHA KA NIYA UPANG MAKILALA SIYA NG PERSONAL

text.tnt-trx-ref-value: God showed how much he loved us by sending his one and only Son into the world so that we might have eternal life through him.

panel.text: Ipinakita ng Diyos ang Kanyang pagmamahal sa atin sapamamagitan ng pagpapadala ng Kanyang Anak upang sapamamagitan Niya ay magkaroon ng buhay na walang hanggan.

buttontext.tnt-trx-ref-value: God Wants You to Know Him

button.buttontext: NAIS NG DIYOS NA MAKILALA MO SIYA

text.tnt-trx-ref-value: And this is the way to have eternal life - to know you, the only true God, and Jesus Christ, the one you sent to earth.

panel.text: Ito ang buhay na walang hanggan: ang makilala ka nila, ang iisa at tunay na Diyos, at ang makilala si Jesu-Cristo na iyong isinugo.

question.tnt-trx-ref-value: Why do you think most people don't know God personally?

page.question: Bakit, sa iyong palagay, maraming tao ang hindi nakakakilala sa Diyos ng personal?
